arcade.potts.env.location

Class PottsLocations2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.potts.env.location.PottsLocation
      • arcade.potts.env.location.PottsLocations
        • arcade.potts.env.location.PottsLocations2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Location, Location2D

    public final class PottsLocations2D
extends PottsLocations
implements Location2D
    Concrete implementation of PottsLocations for 2D.
